name: The Decanter Dining Table
description: The Decanter Dining Table forms part of the vibrant Wanderlust Collection and is a cutting edge example of contemporary British furniture design. This crisp design is ideal for those who want to inject a burst of colour and is available in a wide range of different shades to create different moods in high gloss and satin. These tables also look incredibly smart in any of Davidson's signature timber finishes. The table comes in two standard sizes specifically designed for use as a breakfast table or a small Decanter dining table. Bespoke sizes are also available upon request. Always with a keen eye for detail, this table draws the eye with its sleek, ultra slim-line top, standing on a decanter shaped base that will add sophistication to any room.
